name: CBNRadio
0:
”Alexa, play C. B. N. Radio”
”Alexa, ask C. B. N. Radio to play Cross Country”
”Alexa, ask C. B. N. Radio to list stations”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: c. b. n. radio
des:
Listen to CBN Radio and Catch the Joy with Your Favorite Christian Artists!.

To start, just say "Alexa, play CBN Radio" to start the radio.
At anytime, you can stop the radio by saying "Alexa, stop".

To change stations, say "Alexa, ask CBN Radio to play {Station Name}".
For Example: "Alexa, ask CBN Radio to play Cross Country" or "Alexa, ask CBN Radio to play Selah"
For the complete list of CBN Radio stations say "Alexa, ask CBN Radio to List Stations"

And to find out what song or artist is playing you can say: "Alexa, ask CBN Radio who's playing?"

To get the verse of the day, "Alexa, ask CBN Radio to play Daily Devotion ..."

"Alexa, ask CBN Radio to play ..."
"Southern Gospel",
"Selah",
"Praise",
"Cross Country",
"Contemporary",
"Gospel",
"Superbook",
"Fiesta Hoy",
"CBN News",
"Christmas",
"Cross Country Christmas"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
